General.Name: CSU Digital S.A.
General.Description: CSU Digital S.A., a technology company for financial services, provides digital solutions for payments, banking as a service, and loyalty and incentive programs, as well digital experience. The company operates into two business units, CSU Pays and CSU DX. The CSU Pays unit encompasses solutions in payment methods, loyalty and incentives, and Banking as a Service, including card processing for issuers and acquirers in the credit, debit, digital and virtual modalities, the offer of digital wallets, instant payments (Pix) and cryptocurrencies, and others. The CSU DX unit focuses on the development of digital experience solutions for customer experience and financial processes management with technological and digital density, directing efforts to projects with added value and complexity. The company was formerly known as CSU CardSystem S.A. and changed its name to CSU Digital S.A. in August 2022 after a transformation of its strategic plan, turning into a financial services provider. CSU Digital S.A. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil.
